entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:02 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:02 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:02 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023
